headline: Why Lantheus (LNTH) Stock Is Up Today
summary: Shares of radiopharmaceutical company Lantheus Holdings (NASDAQ:LNTH) jumped 5.9% in the afternoon session after Truist Securities upgraded its rating on the stock to "Buy" from "Hold" and increased its price target.

headline: Broadcom to See Margin Headwinds in Fiscal 2026 But Earnings Growth 'More Important,' Truist Says

headline: How the Narrative Surrounding Reddit Is Evolving Amid Strong Growth and Emerging Engagement Risks
summary: Reddit's stock narrative is shifting as analysts fine tune their models, nudging fair value slightly lower to about $239.76 from roughly $240.70 while trimming the discount rate to around 8.21% from about 8.23%. The modest decrease in required return, together with a small upgrade to expected revenue growth to nearly 33.18% from roughly 32.86%, reflects confidence in sustained top line momentum but acknowledges softer signals around engagement and data visibility. Stay tuned to see how you...
